### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when getting entities
- Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.
- Verify the prototype of the entity matches the one being requested.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the connection points are not blocked by other entities or structures.
- Verify the entities are compatible for connection.
